ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
A plume of feathers #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()!=BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) , made of [npc.earFullDescription] like the rest of [npc.her] body, #ENDIF sprout out where human ears would normally sit. [npc.She] experimentally [npc.verb(twitch)] [npc.her] new feathery ears back and forth.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] Weavile ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF Weavile ears, which are positioned high up on [npc.her] head and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
